title: Lady Gaga goes retro Hollywood glam for her first Golden Globe Awards
title_page: Lady Gaga goes retro Hollywood glam for her first Golden Globe Awards | Daily Mail Online
text:
Lady Gaga covered her tattoos with body make-up and went full retro Hollywood glam for her first-ever nomination at Sunday'sGolden Globe Awards in Beverly Hills.
The 29-year-old pop diva's stylist of seven years, Brandon Maxwell, dressed her in a corseted, black Atelier Versace gown and Marilyn-style wig.
The Haus of Gaga director once told Fashionista: 'With her, of course, you don't really have to think about comfort. That's not really the first thing that comes to her mind.'

The Cheek to Cheek songstress opted for nude lips and diamond accessories to go along with her heavily-cinched waistline and padded hips.
Gaga - born Stefani Germanotta - was dutifully joined at the Beverly Hilton by her fiancé Taylor Kinney, who matched her in an equally traditional tuxedo.
'We keep on, back and forth on [wedding] dates, and I think it’ll just be a surprise,' the 34-year-old actor told DailyMail.com this week.
